title: Unvaccinated Elderly Send Hong Kong’s Covid-19 Death Rate to World’s Highest
sub_head: City was caught unprepared for a massive increase in cases as elderly vaccination rate remained low after monthslong stretches of zero infections
body:
HONG KONG—Almost a year ago, Rio Ling decided to hold off on vaccinating his 86-year-old father against the coronavirus because he was more worried about possible side effects than the virus itself, given that Hong Kong had kept cases low under its “Zero-Covid” policy.
By the time he gave the go-ahead in January, after the Omicron variant had broken through the city’s defenses, it was too late. A few hours after finally receiving the inoculation in late February, Mr. Ling’s dad, who has high blood pressure and dementia, tested positive for Covid-19.
